executive_summary.thesis: Microsoft is the clear leader in enterprise cloud and AI, with Azure growing 30%+ and Copilot driving new revenue streams. Strong competitive moat and recurring revenue model justify premium valuation.

key_findings: Azure revenue growing 30%+ YoY, gaining share vs AWS
Office 365 Copilot early traction with enterprise customers
Operating margins above 40% with strong free cash flow
LinkedIn and Dynamics remain underappreciated growth drivers
risks: Elevated valuation leaves little room for execution missteps
Dependency on enterprise IT spending cyclicality
Open-source AI models could commoditize AI features
report.bull_case: AI monetization exceeds expectations, Azure share gains accelerate
report.bear_case: Enterprise spending slowdown, AI commoditization pressure
